languages.text: Маражай Эзирраеш, известный также как Погибель Бури, пробыл при Вольном Торговце фон Валанциус несколько лет, наводя ужас на весь экипаж. Впрочем, беспокойный и амбициозный нрав все же взял свое, и уставший от общества мон-кай друкари в итоге покинул корабль.
languages.translation_comment: маражай перебил остатки кабала по Q2

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, also known as the Tempest's Doom, spent several years with the Rogue Trader, filling the entire crew with terror. However, with time, his restless and ambitious nature got the better of him. Having grown weary of the company of mon-keigh, the Drukhari left the ship.
languages.original_text: Маражай Эзирраеш, известный также как Погибель Бури, пробыл при Вольном Торговце фон Валанциус несколько лет, наводя ужас на весь экипаж. Впрочем, беспокойный и амбициозный нрав все же взял свое, и уставший от общества мон-кай друкари в итоге покинул корабль.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, also known as the Death of the Tempest, spent several years with the Rogue Trader, filling the entire crew with terror. Though with time, his restless and ambitious nature took over. Having grown weary of the company of mon-keigh, Drukhari left the ship.

Marazhai Aezyrraesh, also known as the Death of the Tempest, spent several years with the Rogue Trader, filling the entire crew with terror. Though with time, his restless and ambitious nature took over. Having grown weary of the company of mon-keigh, Drukhari left the ship.

Marazhai Aezyrraesh, also known as the Death of the Tempest, spent several years with the Rogue Trader, filling the entire crew with terror. However, with time, his restless and ambitious nature got the better of him. Having grown weary of the company of mon-keigh, the Drukhari left the ship.

Marazhai Aezyrraesh, also known as the Death of the Tempest, spent several years with the Rogue Trader, filling the entire crew with terror. However, with time, his restless and ambitious nature got the better of him. Having grown weary of the company of mon-keigh, the Drukhari left the ship.

Marazhai Aezyrraesh, also known as the Tempest's Doom, spent several years with the Rogue Trader, filling the entire crew with terror. However, with time, his restless and ambitious nature got the better of him. Having grown weary of the company of mon-keigh, the Drukhari left the ship.

Marazhai Aezyrraesh, also known as the Tempest's Doom, spent several years with the Rogue Trader, filling the entire crew with terror. However, with time, his restless and ambitious nature got the better of him. Having grown weary of the company of mon-keigh, the Drukhari left the ship.

languages.text: 玛拉斋·艾泽拉什，又被称为狂风阴谋团的死神，在行商浪人身边待了几年，让所有船员都惶恐不安。然而，随着时间的推移，他那躁动不安、野心勃勃的天性占据了上风。这个黑暗灵族厌倦了与猴子厮混在一起日子，离开了飞船。
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, also known as the Tempest's Doom, spent several years with the Rogue Trader, filling the entire crew with terror. However, with time, his restless and ambitious nature got the better of him. Having grown weary of the company of mon-keigh, the Drukhari left the ship.

traits.locale_text: 玛拉斋·艾泽拉什，又被称为狂风阴谋团的死神，在行商浪人身边待了几年，让所有船员都惶恐不安。然而，随着时间的推移，他那躁动不安、野心勃勃的天性占据了上风。这个黑暗灵族厌倦了与猴子厮混在一起日子，离开了飞船。

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, auch bekannt als Untergang des Sturms, verbrachte mehrere Jahre mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} und erfüllte die gesamte Crew mit Angst und Schrecken. Mit der Zeit aber gewann sein rastloses und ehrgeiziges Wesen die Oberhand. Nachdem er der Gesellschaft von Chem-Pan-Sey überdrüssig geworden war, verließ der Drukhari das Schiff.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, also known as the Tempest's Doom, spent several years with the Rogue Trader, filling the entire crew with terror. However, with time, his restless and ambitious nature got the better of him. Having grown weary of the company of mon-keigh, the Drukhari left the ship.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, auch bekannt als Tod des Sturms, verbrachte mehrere Jahre mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} und erfüllte die gesamte Crew mit Angst und Schrecken. Mit der Zeit aber gewann sein rastloses und ehrgeiziges Wesen die Oberhand. Nachdem er der Gesellschaft von Chem-Pan-Sey überdrüssig geworden war, verließ der Drukhari das Schiff.

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, surnommé le Destin de la Tempête, resta plusieurs années durant aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, semant la terreur dans tout l'équipage. Au fil du temps, le caractère ambitieux et intrépide du Drukhari prit le dessus, et, las de la compagnie des mon-keigh, il quitta le vaisseau.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, also known as the Tempest's Doom, spent several years with the Rogue Trader, filling the entire crew with terror. However, with time, his restless and ambitious nature got the better of him. Having grown weary of the company of mon-keigh, the Drukhari left the ship.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, surnommé la Mort de la Tempête, resta durant plusieurs années aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, semant la terreur dans tout l'équipage. Au fil du temps, le caractère ambitieux et intrépide du Drukhari prit le dessus, et, las de la compagnie des mon-keigh, il quitta le vaisseau.

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, también conocido como la Perdición de la Tempestad, pasó años junto a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, aterrando a toda la tripulación. No obstante, con el tiempo, su naturaleza inquieta y ambiciosa le superó. Cansado de la compañía de los mon-keigh, el Drukhari dejó la nave.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, also known as the Tempest's Doom, spent several years with the Rogue Trader, filling the entire crew with terror. However, with time, his restless and ambitious nature got the better of him. Having grown weary of the company of mon-keigh, the Drukhari left the ship.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, también conocido como la Muerte de la Tempestad, pasó años junto a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, aterrando a toda la tripulación. No obstante, con el tiempo, su naturaleza inquieta y ambiciosa le superó. Cansado de la compañía de los mon-keigh, el Drukhari dejó la nave.

languages.text: 「テンペストの破滅」とも呼ばれるマラズハイ・アエジレシュは、自由開拓者と共に数年を過ごし、乗組員全員を恐怖で満たした。しかし、時が経つにつれ、落ち着きがなく野心的な性格が災いした。モン＝ケイとの付き合いに嫌気がさしたデュカーリは船を去った。
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, also known as the Tempest's Doom, spent several years with the Rogue Trader, filling the entire crew with terror. However, with time, his restless and ambitious nature got the better of him. Having grown weary of the company of mon-keigh, the Drukhari left the ship.

traits.locale_text: 「テンペストの死」とも呼ばれるマラズハイ・アエジレシュは、ローグトレーダーと共に数年を過ごし、乗組員全員を恐怖で満たした。しかし、時が経つにつれ、落ち着きがなく野心的な性格が災いした。モン＝ケイとの付き合いに嫌気がさしたデュカーリは船を去った。

languages.text: Fırtına Felaketi olarak da bilinen Marazhai Aezyrraesh, birkaç yıl Hür Tacir'le kaldı ve tüm mürettebata dehşet saçtı ancak zaman içinde tez canlı ve tutkulu doğası ona üstün geldi. Mon-keighlere eşlik etmekten bıkan Drukhari, gemiden ayrıldı.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, also known as the Tempest's Doom, spent several years with the Rogue Trader, filling the entire crew with terror. However, with time, his restless and ambitious nature got the better of him. Having grown weary of the company of mon-keigh, the Drukhari left the ship.

traits.locale_text: Fırtına Felaketi olarak da bilinen Marazhai Aezyrraesh, birkaç yıl Hür Tacir'le kaldı ve tüm mürettebata dehşet saçtı ancak zaman içinde tez canlı ve tutkulu doğası ona üstün geldi. Mon-keighlere eşlik etmekten bıkan Drukhari, gemiden ayrıldı.

languages.translation_comment: маражай перебил остатки кабала по Q2
